secret fighting arts.Acanthus Doctor: You may wear up to 3 Satchel gear cards. When you [Depart], if you are not wearing any armor, for each [[Green]] you have, gain +1 strength token and add 1 [[Armor]] to all hit locations. Spend [[Activation]] and a Flower or Fresh Acanthus resource to heal a permanent injury you or an adjacent survivor suffered this showdown.
secret fighting arts.Actualize: Gain +1 speed when attacking with a sword. After you make attack rolls with a sword, you may discard a roll result to increase another roll result by 1. You may do this as many times as you like, so long as there is at least 1 attack roll result left.
secret fighting arts.Aerial Transfusion: It requires an addtional two bleeding tokens to kill you. During your act you may spend [[Activation]] to freely rearrange all survivors' bleeding tokens.
secret fighting arts.Ageless Apprentice: When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide to not gain it. When you [Depart], you may rotate up to 3 gear cards in your gear grid. This changes the location of their affinities and arrows. Otherwise, the gear functions normally.
secret fighting arts.Altered Destiny: If you would gain a negative attribute token, gain a positive attribute token of that type instead.
secret fighting arts.Beast of Caratosis: You may [Concentrate]. If you do, perform Beast of Caratosis at the start of your next act. -> Place your survivor adjacent to the monster. Activate a weapon in your grid and attack the monster. For this attack, your attack speed is equal to your [[Red Affinity]], you hit automatically, and you gain strength equalto double your [[Red Affinity]]. Then gain +6 Hunt XP.
secret fighting arts.Beetle Strength: Once per showdown, you may spend [[Activation]] to shove an adjacent obstacle terrain. If you do, move the terrain directly away from you in a straight line until it encounters a board edge or another obstacle terrain. Any monsters the terrain passes over suffer a wound, and any survivors it [Collides] with suffer [Knockback] 7. You are knocked down and gain +1 Hunt XP.
secret fighting arts.Black Guard Style: Swords in your gear grid [Block] 1. When you block a hit with a sword, your next attack that round with a sword gains +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 speed. Limit once per round. During the settlement phase, you may spend [[Endeavor]] to train a survivor. They gain the Black Guard Style. You lose it and suffer the Broken Arm severe injury.
secret fighting arts.Bone Whisper: When another survivor dies on the showdown board, place a token hwere they died. If you pass over it, remove the token and eat their skull. [Heal] your survivor and roll 1d10 + your Hunt XP: 1-3 = +1 permanent movement, speed, evasion; 4-8 = +1 permanent strength; 9-18 = Gain a Fighting Art & +5 survival; 19+ = At the end of the showdown, you are gone forever.
secret fighting arts.Clarity of Darkness: At the start of the showdown, gain the Path of Gloom survivor status card. Other survivors cannot voluntarily end their movement adjacent to you.
secret fighting arts.Courtly Screenwriter: At the start of the showdown, secretely write down on a scrap of paper which survivors will live and who will deal the killing blow. During the aftermath, if your predictions are correct, raise the settlements's Survival Limit by 1.
secret fighting arts.Death Touch: Gain +1 accuracy when attacking with Fist & Tooth. When you wound the monster, it gains -1 toughness until the end of your attack. You cannot use this if you are male.
secret fighting arts.Devil's Melody: Ballad of the Devil's Melody (4): Gain +10 survival, +10 insanity, +1 movement token, and +1 speed token. At the start of each round, the monster suffers an automatic wound and each survivor suffers a random severe injury.
secret fighting arts.Eternal Will: Gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength fo reach permanent injury you have. You may always [Depart], even when retired.
secret fighting arts.Fencing: Ignore [Parry] when attempting to wound hit locations. When a monster attacks you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore 1 hit. Limit, once per round.
secret fighting arts.Frozen Star: Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a monster's brain. They gain -2 accuracy until the end of the round. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a survivor's brain, killing them instantly. They die.
secret fighting arts.God of Cheaters: Gain +4 Luck. Add your luck attribute to your strength and evasion attributes.
secret fighting arts.Grace of Dormenatus: You may [Concentrate]. If you do, perform Grace of Dormenatus at the start of your next act. -> All survivors gain armor at all hit locations equal to your [[Green Affinity]]. They may remove up to the same number of tokens. Then gain +6 Hunt XP. If you still exist, gain the [Priority Target] token.
secret fighting arts.Hellfire: You cannot lose or remove this fighting art. Gain +1 strength for each [[Red Affinity]] you have.
secret fighting arts.Immovable Object: If you are on an unoccupied space, you stand firm in the face of any force. You cannot be knocked down and may ignore [Knockback].
secret fighting arts.King of a Thousand Battles: Gain +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 evasion. You may [Dodge] any number of times in a round. Only 1 survivor may have this SFA.
secret fighting arts.King's Step: Whenever you attack, you may discard any number of Battle Pressure hit locations drawn and draw an equal number of new hit locations. Whenever you attack, after drawing hit locations, but before rolling to wound, you may choose one hit location drawn and discard it to draw a new hit location. Traps will cancel these effects.
secret fighting arts.Legendary Lungs: Once per attack, for each successful hit, make an additional attack roll.
secret fighting arts.Lucernae's Lantern: You may [Concentrate]. If you do, perform Lucernae's Lantern at the start of your next act. -> Reveal hit locations equal to half your [[Blue Affinity]] (rounded down) one at a time. The monster suffers a critical wound at any locations with critical wound effects (Ignore the effects of Traps). Then reshuffle the HL deck. Then gain +6 Hunt XP.
secret fighting arts.Mind Palace: When you [Depart] or gain this, choose a Fight Art from the deck. For the rest of the lantern year, treat the effects of the chosen chard as an ability.
secret fighting arts.Necromancer: When you [Depart], gain +1 [[Armor]] to all hit locations for each gear card in your grid with the Symbol keyword. If you would die or forget this, the settlement gains the Knowledge Worm Innovation. If you would roll on the severe injury table, roll on the Worm Trauma instead: 1-3 Dead; 4-5 Gain 2 bleeding tokens and -1 evasion token; 6-8 Gain 1 bleeding token & 1d5 insanity; 9 Gain 1 bleeding token & +1 strength token; 10 You are knocked down and gain 1 Iron Strange Resource.
secret fighting arts.Red Fist: At the start of each showdown, each survivor gains +1 strength token. Survivors may spend +1 strength tokens in place of survival.
secret fighting arts.Scholar of Death: On arrival, gain reroll tokens equal to the number of volumes recorded about your quarry. Discard a reroll token to reroll one of your roll results during the showdown. This includes monster roll results when you are the monster controller.
secret fighting arts.Silk Surgeon: (1): You may spend [[Activation]] while adjacent to another survivor to add 2 [[Armor]] to one of their hit locations. (2): While all armor in your gear grid is silk and all jewelry is amber, gain +2 evasion. (3): During the aftermath, roll 1d10 for each other survivor that died during the showdown. On a 7+, revive them.
secret fighting arts.Sun Eater: At the start of the showdown, gain survival up to the settlement's Survival Limit. If you have any +1 strength tokens, you may spend them all to perform the Surge survival actions.
secret fighting arts.Suppressed Shadow: Ignore First Strike. On a [Perfect Hit], your first wound attempt of the attack automatically succeeds and inflicts a critcial wound. If you die during the showdown, place a Shade minion in the space you occupied.
secret fighting arts.Swordsman's Promise: At the start of each showdown, gain survival up to your settlement's survival limit if you have a sword in your gear grid.
secret fighting arts.Synchronized Strike: When you are adjacent to a monster, attack with a melee weapon, and have an [Attack Assist], your attack gains +1 accuracy, +1 strength. Limit, once per round.
secret fighting arts.True Blade: All swords in your gear grid gain deadly. Gain +3 luck when attacking with a sword if you have [Ghostly Beauty] and [Narcissistic] disorders.
secret fighting arts.Zero Presence: Gain +1 strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.

fighting arts.Abyssal Sadist: the first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity. Ignore the effects of the [Fear of the Dark] and [Prey] disorders.
fighting arts.Acrobatics: When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend [[Movement]] to place your survivor on any space adjacent to the monster.
fighting arts.Ambidextrous: All melee weapons in your gear grid gain [Paired]. Ambidextrous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed, or heavy gear in your gear grid.
fighting arts.Berserker: Once per showdown, you may spend [[Activation]] to suffer [Bash] and the [Frenzy] brain trauma.
fighting arts.Bloodzerker: Gain +1 strength for each of your bleeding tokens. When you have 3+ bleeding tokens, you are [Guardless].
fighting arts.Blotted Out: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.
fighting arts.Burning Ambition: When you are instructed to Skip the Next Hunt, ignore it.
fighting arts.Buring Focus: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.
fighting arts.Carapace of Will: At the start of the showdown, gain the Steadfast survivor status card. When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.
fighting arts.Champion's Rite: Before making your attack, you may add your understanding  to your accuracy attribute for the attack. Limit, once per showdown.
fighting arts.Clutch Fighter: While you have 3 or more bleeding tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.
fighting arts.Combo Master: On a [Perfect Hit], make 1 additional attack roll.
fighting arts.Crossarm Block: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.
fighting arts.Defender: When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival. You cannot use this if you have a [Broken Jaw].
fighting arts.Double Dash: During your act, once per round, you may spend [[Activation]] to gain [[Movement]]
fighting arts.Extra Sense: You may [Dodge] 1 additional time per round.
fighting arts.Fated Blow: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and [Devastating] 1.
fighting arts.First Step: Whenever you attack, after drawing HL but before rolling to wound, you may suffer [[Monster Lvl]] brain damage to chosse a drawn HL and then discard it to draw a new one. [Trap]s cancel this  effect.
fighting arts.Glass Mask: When you [Depart], gain 3 insanity. If you have [Face Painting], gain an additional +3 insanity.
fighting arts.Harvestman: Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token. If you have the [Tiny Arachnophobia] disorder, you cannot use this fighting art.
fighting arts.Headliner: When you become [Doomed] or gain the [Priority Target] token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength.
fighting arts.Heroic: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
fighting arts.Invigorator: Gain +1 accuracy and +1 speed while you have no insanity.
fighting arts.Last Man Standing: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.
fighting arts.Leader: Whenever you [Encourage] a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until the end of the round. Once per Hunt phase, you may inspire another survivor. They use your understanding and courage to resolve a hunt or story event.
fighting arts.Lure Epilepsy: Once per showdown, you may spend [[Movement]] to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.
fighting arts.Mammoth Hunting: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.
fighting arts.Monster Claw Style: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 accuracy, +1 strength, and [Savage].
fighting arts.Monster Empathy: Gain +1 strength for each mood in play.
fighting arts.Mighty Strike: On a [Perfect Hit], gain +2 strength until the end of the attack.
fighting arts.Orator of Death: Once per showdown, you may spend [[Activation]] to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity. When you die, you [Encourage] all survivors.
fighting arts.Otehrworldly Luck: During the Hunt and Settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table.
fighting arts.Phantom Friend: The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resource and gain +1 evasion token. Lose this token if you are [Deaf] or become Deaf during the showdown.
fighting arts.Propulsion Drive: At the start of the showdown, gain the Momentum survivor status card. When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attempting to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.
fighting arts.Purpose: During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.
fighting arts.Regicide: When another survivor performs [Encourage], an action that makes them scream or roar, or any other audible effect, you may absorb it. Cancel the action and gain +1 strength token.
fighting arts.Relentless: When a monster moves away from you during your attack, you may [Pursue]. Limit once per attack.
fighting arts.Rhythm Chaser: On [Arrival], gain +1 evasion token. When you are knocked down, if you don't have an instrument in your gear grid, remove all your 1+ evasion tokens. Rhythm Chaser cannot be used if there is any heavy gear in your gear grid.
fighting arts.Ruthless: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On 7+, gain a Skull basic resouce.
fighting arts.Seasoned Hunter: Whenever a random hunt event result is: 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99, 100. The event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.
fighting arts.Sneak Attack: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +1 strength for that attack.
fighting arts.Strategist: During the showdown step, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.
fighting arts.Tenacious: When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may put that hit location back on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile. Limit once per round.
fighting arts.Timeless Eye: Your attack roll is a [Perfect Hit] on a result of 9 or 10. You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the [Blind] severe head injury.
fighting arts.Thrill Seeker: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.
fighting arts.Tough: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. This cannot exceed 10.
fighting arts.Trailblazer: The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster. At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.
fighting arts.Transcended Masochist: When you gain a bleeding token gain 1+ survival and +1 insanity. Ignore the effects of the [Aichmophobia] and [Apathetic] disorders.
fighting arts.Trick Attack: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the [Priority Target] token.
fighting arts.Tumble: When something would [Collide] with you, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully get out of the way. Place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.
fighting arts.Unbreakable: Once per lantern year, you may ignore one of your severe injury roll results. If you do, gain a random disorder.
fighting arts.Unconscious Fighter: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.
fighting arts.Unrelenting: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.
fighting arts.Vengeance: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.
fighting arts.Virtuoso: When you activate an instrument, all survivors are [Encourage]. Your [Ballads] cost 2 less to perform.
fighting arts.Wardrobe Expert: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.
fighting arts.Armored Fist: Requires Fist & Tooth Proficiency. Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain strength equal to the current armor value of your arms hit location.
fighting arts.Backstabber: On a [Perfect Hit] with a dagger, your first wound attempt in the attack gains [Devastating] 1. When you attack a monster with a dagger from its blind spot, if you have the [Hoarder] or [Secretive] disorder, increase the range of your range of your [Perfect Hit]s by 1.
fighting arts.Convalescer: Whenever you remove bleeding tokens, gain survival, or add armor points, increase this benefity by 1. Your attacks gain the club keyword.
fighting arts.Dark Manifestation: Once per round, at the start of your act, you may spend the requisite insanity to perform one of the following abilities: 3 - Gain +2 strength until the end of the round; 6 - Perform [Block] 1; 13 - If adjacent to the monster, roll 1d10. On a 6+, it suffers 1 wound.
fighting arts.Ethereal Pact: Add +3 to your brain trauma rolls. When you suffer the Impossible brain trauma. Perform Birth of a Savior and choose a dream.
fighting arts.Giant's Blood: When you gain this fighting art, gain +1 strength, -1 evasion permanently. You may [Consume] skulls. If you do, gain the [Marrow Hunger] impairment.
fighting arts.Infernal Rhythm: You may spend [[Activation]] to play an instrument in your gear grid. Reveal the next 3 monster HL, then put them back in any order. Whenever you activate an instrument, gain a lantern token. At the start of another survivor's act, you may spend 5 lantern tokens to give them [[Activation]] & [[Movement]].
fighting arts.Infinite Lives: You cannot gain new fighting arts or disorders. When you would gain one, instead gain a new lifetime! Give yourself a new name and a once per lifetime reroll. (Gain +1 survival for naming and the reroll regardless of Principle. Only 1 reroll at a time)
fighting arts.Rolling Gait: Spend [[Activation]], your next attack with a bow ignores [Cumbersome]. At the end of your attack with a bow or arrow, if you hit the monster from outside its facing, it gains a [Flinch Token].
fighting arts.Shielderang: If you have a shield in your gear grid, ignore the first severe injury you suffer each showdown. If you have Shield Specialization, shields in your gear grid gain [Reach] 3 and +1 strength for each level of Shield weapon Proficiency you have beyond 3.
fighting arts.Stockist: You may [Concentrate]. If you do, perform Stock Shot. -> Activate a bow in your gear grid and attack the monster. For this attack, your bow's range and strength are equal to the number of resouces in the settlement storage. Limit once per showdown phase.
fighting arts.Story of Blood 1: The first time you gain a bleeding token during the showdown, gain +1 survival. [Observation]: When [[Endeavor]] is spent at Bloodletting or Sacrifice, gain +1 mark (There are 4 marks).
fighting arts.Story of Blood 2: Spend [[Activation]] to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 [[Armor]] to any hit location and suffer 1 brain damage. [Observation]: When you use this while you have 4+ bleeding tokens, gain +1 mark (There are 4 marks).
fighting arts.Story of Blood 3: Spend [[Activation]] to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 [[Armor]] to any hit location. [Observation]: When another survivor dies from bleeding tokens, gain +1 mark (There are 3 marks).
fighting arts.Story of Blood 4: Spend [[Activation]] to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 [[Armor]] to all hit locations. You may spend your bleeding tokens in place of survival. [Observation]: When you use this, gain +1 mark (There are 7 marks). When all marks are filled: roll 1d10, on 6+ lose 1 mark. Otherwise die.
fighting arts.Sword Oath: When you gain this, write the name of any sword gear on your record sheet. Note each time you wound with the named sword. If you have wounded 18+ times with this sword, it gains [Devastating] 1 and [Sentient] while you have it equipped. When you suffer the [Flee] brain trauma, lose this fighting art.

disorders.Absent Seizures: The first  time you would suffer a brain trauma each showdown, you are instead knocked down and forget a fighting art.
disorders.Aichmophobia: You cannot activate or [Depart] with axes, swords, spears, daggers, scythes, or katars in your gear grid.
disorders.Anxiety: At the start of each showdown, gain the [Priority Target] token unless you have [Stinky] gear in your gear grid.
disorders.Apathetic: You cannot use or gain survival. You cannot gain courage. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ understanding.
disorders.Arithmophilia: When you gain this disorder, roll 1d5. Your movement is that number. Ignore all other movement modifiers.
disorders.Atelophobia: When there are no [Perfect Hits] in your attack, suffer 1 brain damage.
disorders.Binge Eating: You cannot [Depart] unless you have [Consumable] gear in your gear grid. You must consume if a choice to consume arises.
disorders.Blood Lust: Whenever a survivor gains a bleeding token, suffer the [Frenzy] brain trauma. Limit once per round.
disorders.Controlophobia: While you are the monster controller, double any damage you suffer.
disorders.Coprolalia: All your gear is [Noisy]. You are always a threat unless you are knocked down, even if an effect says otherwise.
disorders.Delicious: You are still considered a threat when you are knocked down, unless you use an effect that says otherwise.
disorders.Destined: If you do not [Depart], lose all survival and insanity.
disorders.Directional Dyslexia: Your [[Movement]] can only be spent to move in a single straight line.
disorders.Enfeebled: It takes one less bleeding token to kill you.
disorders.Ergophobia: When you are a [Returning Survivor], you do not generate [[Endeavor]]. You cannot endeavor.
disorders.Flower Addiction: You may only [Depart] to hunt the Flower Knight. After you [Depart], cure this disorder.
disorders.Ghostly Beauty: Double all insanity you gain. Double all survival you spend.
disorders.Hemophobia: During the showdown, whenever a survivor (including you) gains a bleeding token, you are knocked down.
disorders.Hoarder: Whenever you are a [Returning Survivor], archive 1 resource gained from the last showdown and gain +1 courage.
disorders.Honorable: You cannot attack a monster from its blind spot or if it is knocked down.
disorders.Hyperactive: During the showdown, you must move at least 1 space every round.
disorders.Hyper-Sensitivity: You may [Dodge] one additional time per round. Whenever you are hit by an attack, you must [Dodge] at least once, if possible.
disorders.Immortal: While you are insane, convert all damage dealt to your hit locations to brain damage. You cannot spend survival while insane.
disorders.Indecision: If you are the event revealer of hunt events that call on you to make a roll, roll twice and use the lower result.
disorders.Megalophobia: You may not [Depart] for hunts or showdowns with monsters that occupy more than 4 spaces on the showdown board.
disorders.Monster Panic: Whenever you suffer brain damage from an [Intimidate] action, suffer 1 additional brain damage.
disorders.Motion Sickness: Whenever you suffer [Knockback], gain 1 bleeding token.
disorders.Narcissistic: You may not wear armor at the head location. If you are wearing armor at the head locatino when you gain this disorder, archive it.
disorders.Overprotective: When an adjacent survivor is knocked down, you are also knocked down.
disorders.Pacifist: You cannot activate a weapon to attack. Ignore this if you are [frenzied].
disorders.Performance Anxiety: You cannot be nominated for [Intimacy]. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ courage.
disorders.Phobophobia: At the start of your act, if you have 0 insanity, gain the [Terrified] surivivor status card.
disorders.Photophilia: You cannot [Depart] without a lantern in your gear grid.
disorders.Post-Traumatic Stress: Next settlement phase, you do not contribute or participate in any endeavors. Skip the next hunt to recover.
disorders.Prey: You may not spend survival unless you are insane.
disorders.Prima Donna: Each survivor turn, you must take your act first (roll off each turn if multiple survivors have this disorder).
disorders.Quixotic: If you are insane when you [Depart], gain +1 survival and +1 strength token.
disorders.Rageholic: Whenever you suffer a severe injury, also suffer the [Frenzy] brain trauma.
disorders.Revenge: When a survivor dies during the showdown, suffer the [Frenzy] brain trauma.
disorders.Schadenfreude: When another survivor suffers a severe injury, you are knocked down and gain +1 insanity.
disorders.Secretive: When you are a [Returning Survivor], you must skip the next hunt.
disorders.Seizures: During the showdown, whenever you suffer damage to your head location, you are knocked down.
disorders.Shallow Lungs: When you [Encourage], you are knocked down.
disorders.Somniphobia: On [Arrival], lose half your survival, rounded down.
disorders.Spiral Ganglia: At the start of the showdown, gain the [Darkness Awareness] survivor status card.
disorders.Squeamish: You cannot [Depart] with any [Stinky] gear in your gear grid. If a status or effect would cause you to become stinky, lose all your survival.
disorders.Stage Fright: Whenever you become [Doomed] or gain the [Priority Target] token, lose 1 survival.
disorders.Stark Raving: You are always insane, regardless of your insanity.
disorders.Subjugated: When you are knocked down, you are [Dominated]. When you depart to hunt the King, cure this disorder.
disorders.Sun-Drunk: When you have any +1 strength tokens, you cannot [Dash], [Dodge], or [Run Away].
disorders.Superstitious: You cannot activate or [Depart] with Other gear in your gear grid.
disorders.Tiny Arachnophobia: You cannot carry any gear with the amber keyword. You cannot gain any resources with the silk keyword.
disorders.Traumatized: Whenever you end your act adjacent to a monster, you are knocked down.
disorders.Tunnel Vision: When you spend [[Activation]], you may only activate weapons.
disorders.Vermin Obsession: While there is a [Bug Patch] terrain tile on the showdown board, you cannot spend survival.
disorders.Vestiphobia: You cannot wear body armor at the body location. If you are currently, archive it.
disorders.Weak Spot: When you gain this disorder, roll a random hit location and record it. You cannot [Depart] unless you have armor at this location.
disorders.Weltschmerz: You cannot [Depart] unless you have updated the death count this lantern year.

abilities and impairments.Acid Palms: Add 1d10 strength to wound attempts when attacking with Fist & Tooth.
abilities and impairments.Ageless: You may hunt if you are retired. When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.
abilities and impairments.Analyze: At the start of the survivors' turn, if you are adjacent to the monster, reveal the top AI card, then put it back on top of the deck.
abilities and impairments.Arrogance: When you gain knowledge from the forum that is not from Marrowism, it costs +2 Lumi. You cannot refuse a Majestic Invitation from a Bone Eater.
abilities and impairments.Astute Psyche: When you make an Observation about a knowledge, make two Observations instead.
abilities and impairments.Astute: On Arrival, if possible, add an Acanthus Plant terrain card to the showdown.
abilities and impairments.Bitter Frenzy: Each showdown, the first time you suffer the frenzy brain trauma, gain 1d10 survival. You may spend survival while [Frenzy].
abilities and impairments.Caratosis: Before making an attack roll, you may declare "Caratosis X". If you do, that attack gains X automatic hits. X cannot be more than your total red affinities. When the attack ends, gain +X Hunt XP.
abilities and impairments.Compelled: You must depart if able to do so. If you are unable to depart for any reason (retired, must skip, etc), you depart anyway, but set your insanity and survival to 0.
abilities and impairments.Cutthroat: On a [Perfect Hit], gain [[Activation]] after your attack ends, which must be spent immediately. Limit once per round.
abilities and impairments.Dark Calling: Increase the range of your [Perfect Hit]s by 1. When you are a returning survivor, roll 1d10. If the result is less than or equal to your Hunt XP, you leave the settlement.
abilities and impairments.Dilettante: When you depart, gain a random knowledge from the knowledge deck. If you have no empty knowledge slots, you must replace an existing knowledge.
abilities and impairments.Discourse Savant: Whenever you roll on a table while ranking up your philosophy, you may choose your result instead.
abilities and impairments.Dormenatus: When you suffer damage, you may declare "Dormenatus X". If you do, gain X[[Armor]] to each hit location. X cannot be more than your total green affinities. When the attack ends, gain +X Hunt XP.
abilities and impairments.Explore: When you roll on an investigate table, add +2 to your roll result.
abilities and impairments.Fated Battle: At the start of a showdown with the picked monster, gain +1 speed token.
abilities and impairments.Fixated: You can attack the monster only from its facing or when it is knocked down.
abilities and impairments.Forgettable: Gain +2 permanent evasion. You cannot be Encouraged.
abilities and impairments.Founder's Eye: Add +1 to all rolls on the Intimacy event.
abilities and impairments.Grounded: At any time, you may set your insanity to 0, 1, or 2. Limit once per lantern year.
abilities and impairments.Heart of the Sword: (Storm) If you gain weapon Proficiency during the Aftermath, gain +3 ranks. Gain 1 Iron strange resource.
abilities and impairments.Important: When you depart, if your total number of armor points (after bonuses) is hight than each other departing survivor, gain survival up to the settlement's survival limit. Otherwise, lose all survival.
abilities and impairments.Inferiority Complex: You may not depart if you have the highest strength among all departing survivors.
abilities and impairments.Iridescent Hide: Gain +1[[Armor]] to all hit locations for each different colored affinity in your gear grid.
abilities and impairments.Iron Will: You cannot be knocked down. Reduce all Knockback you suffer to Knockback 1.
abilities and impairments.Legendcaller: Once per lifetime, on a hunt board space after Overwhelming Darkness, in place of rolling a random hunt event, use 53 as your result.
abilities and impairments.Leyline Walker: While there is no armor or accessory gear in you gear grid, gain +3 evasion.
abilities and impairments.Life Exchange: In the Aftermath, gain 1 additional Hunt XP. You may not wear Other gear. If you trigger the White Secret event or retire, you cease to exist.
abilities and impairments.Limb-maker: (Sculptor) Once per settlement phase, spend 2[[Endeavor]] to remove a survivor's dismembered injury and gain 1 bone resource.
abilities and impairments.Lucernae: When you suffer damage, you may declare "Lucernae X". If you do, gain X Luck. X cannot be more than your total blue affinities. When the attack ends, gain +X Hunt XP.
abilities and impairments.Mad Oracle: Once per showdown, as a monster draws its AI card, name a card out loud. If the AI card drawn is the card you named, gain +1 evasion token.
abilities and impairments.Mark of the Cyclops Knight: When you craft a Seed Pattern, gain +1 strength & +1 Hunt XP. At 10+ Hunt XP, you leave the settlement.
abilities and impairments.Marrow Hunger: When the Murder or Skull Eater event is drawn, this survivor is nominated.
abilities and impairments.Matchmaker: When you are a returning survivor, once per year you may spend 1[[Endeavor]] to Intimacy.
abilities and impairments.Murderer: During the hunt or showdown, if you are ever alone with another survivor, you murder them; keep track of your Body Count on your survivor sheet. Before resolving each rank of Homicidalism, roll 1d10 and subtract your Body Count from the result. On a 1 or lower, the settlement kills you.
abilities and impairments.Oracle's Eye: At the start of the showdown, look through the AI deck, then shuffle.
abilities and impairments.Peerless: When you gain insanity, you may gain an equal amount of survival.
abilities and impairments.Phototaxis: While there is a Fallen Lantern terrain tile on the board, you cannot spend survival.
abilities and impairments.Possessed: You cannot use weapon Specialization, weapon mastery, or fighting arts.
abilities and impairments.Prepared: When rolling to determine a straggler, add your hunt XP to your roll result.
abilities and impairments.Presage: (Witch) Each time you attack, before drawing hit locations, say a HL name. For each matching HL, gain +3 insanity and +10 strength when attempting to wound said location.
abilities and impairments.Pristine: When you suffer a dismembered severe injury, ignore it and gain 1 bleeding token instead.
abilities and impairments.Psychovore: (Reaper) Once per showdown, you may remove an adjacent survivor's disorder. If you do, they gain 1 bleeding token and you gain +1 permanent strength. At the end of the showdown, if you haven't removed a disorder, you die.
abilities and impairments.Radiant Presence: When you are a returning survivor, gain +2 Lumi.
abilities and impairments.Ravenous: You may spend [[Activation]] to [Consume] a piece of gear or resource with the consumable keyword. Archive it. During the Aftermath, if you did not perform this at least once this year, suffer -1 permanent strength.
abilities and impairments.Reflection: Your complete affinities and incomplete affinities count as all colors. You may dodge at any time and as number of times per round. When you attack from a blind spot, add +1d10 to all wound attempts for that attack.
abilities and impairments.Refraction: Your complete affinities and incomplete affinities count as all colors. During the showdown, after performing a survival action, gain +1 survival.
abilities and impairments.Rival's Scar: Gain +1 permanent strength and -1 permanent evasion.
abilities and impairments.Rooted to All: (Absolute) If you are standing at the start of your act, reveal the top 2 cards of the AI deck and put them back in any order.
abilities and impairments.Selfish: When you [Encourage] another survivor, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you do not Encourage. Keep your survival. You cannot Encourage again this round. If it is possible for your survivor to use [Meat Shield] to aviod harm, they must use it.
abilities and impairments.Selfless: While you are alive, increase the settlement's survival limit by +1. Each Collectivist can increase the limit. When you depart, set your survival to 0 after applying all bonuses.
abilities and impairments.Sleepless: You cannot gain survival during the hunt or showdown.
abilities and impairments.Song Heart: Reduce the cost of performing your Ballads by 1.
abilities and impairments.Sour Death: When you are knocked down, you may [Encourage] yourself (even if deaf). If you do, gain +1 strength token.
abilities and impairments.Spoiled: If you are a returning survivor and CC did not increase in the aftermath, skip the next hunt and sulk.
abilities and impairments.Stalwart: Ignore being knocked down by brain trauma and intimidation actions.
abilities and impairments.Story of the Forsaker: You cannot be knocked down during a showdown with a Nemesis monster.
abilities and impairments.Story of the Goblin: Once per showdown you may roll 1d10. On a 3+, gain the [Priority Target] token and the monster gains +1 damage token.
abilities and impairments.Story of the Young Hero: At the start of your act, you may gain 2 bleeding tokens and +1 survival.
abilities and impairments.Super Hair: You may spend [[Activation]] to freely exchange tokens with adjacent surivors who have Super Hair.
abilities and impairments.Sweet Battle: Once per round, you may [Surge] without spending survival. If you do, the [[Activation]] must be used to activate a weapon.
abilities and impairments.Thundercaller: Once per lifetime, on a hunt board space after Overwhelming Darkness, in place of rolling a random hunt event, use 100 as your result.
abilities and impairments.Tinker: When you are a returning survivor, gain +1[[Endeavor]] to use this phase.
abilities and impairments.Twelve Fingers: (Gambler) You cannot carry two-handed gear. On a [Perfect Hit], you gain +5 insanity and +1 luck for the attack. However, for each natural 1 rolled when attempting to hit, suffer 5 brain damage and -1 luck for the attack.
abilities and impairments.Unrestrained: All your weapons, except Fist & Tooth, have frail while in your gear grid. If you wound a Super-Dense HL with Fist & Tooth, suffer the Broken Arm severe injury at the end of the attack.
abilities and impairments.Way of Rust: (Rust) Your bleeding tokens are also +1 evasion tokens.
abilities and impairments.Woebegone: While Luck is on the showdown board, the other survivors' weapons gain [Unwieldy].

Accuracy Training I.Condition: When you successfully hit the monster, gain +1 mark. Limit once per attack.

Adrenaline Junkie.Ability: When you attack with 3+ speed and draw the trap, gain +1 luck token.

Affirmation.Ability: You can spend insanity as though it were survival.

All for One I.Ability: With their permission, you can spend other survivors' survival as though it were your own. Limit once per round.
All for One I.Condition: When another survivor lets you spend their survival, gain +1 mark.

All for One II.Ability: With their permission, you can spend other survivors' survival as though it were your own. Limit twice per round.
All for One II.Condition: When another survivor lets you spend their survival, gain +1 mark.

All for One III.Ability: With their permission, you can spend other survivors' survival as though it were your own.

Appreciation.Ability: During the showdown, when you would archive a resource or gear, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you keep it instead.

Aspirational Ethos.Ability: +1 strength for every 10 CC the settlement has.

Believe in Yourself I.Ability: You are [Guardless]. On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain +1 evasion token.
Believe in Yourself I.Condition: In the Aftermath, if you have no filled heavy injury boxes, gain +1 mark.

Believe in Yourself II.Ability: You are [Guardless]. On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain +2 evasion tokens.
Believe in Yourself II.Condition: In the Aftermath, if you have no filled injury boxes, gain +1 mark.

Believe in Yourself III.Ability: You are [Guardless]. On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain +3 evasion tokens.

Better Than This.Ability: During your act, you may spend up to 5 insanity to gain that much survival. Limit once per showdown.
Better Than This.Condition: (Dangerous) When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Blackheart.Ability: On Arrival, gain +1 strength token. Add your number of +1 strength tokens to your brain trauma rolls.

Blood Dancer I.Condition: When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 mark.

Blood Dancer II.Ability: +1 strength for each bleeding token you have. While you have any bleeding tokens, you lose yourself to the blood and are [Guardless].
Blood Dancer II.Condition: When you wound the monster while Guardless, gain +1 mark.

Blood Dancer III.Ability: +1 strength for each bleeding token you have.

Braggart.Ability: When you [Encourage] a survivor, gain +2 survival and they lose 1 survival.
Braggart.Condition: When you are Encouraged, gain +1 mark.

Call the Storm.Ability: Once per round, you may spend 2 insanity to give your next wound attempt bonus strength equal to your weapon's proficiency.

Call to Arms.Ability: During your act, you may set all other survivors' insanity equal to your insanity. Limit once per showdown.

Chosen I.Condition: When you make a dangerous observation, gain +1 mark.

Chosen II.Ability: You may erase an observation from another knowledge you possess.
Chosen II.Condition: When you erase an observation using this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Chosen III.Ability: You may record a permanent injury you do not alread have to erase an observation from another knowledge you possess.

Combat Conviction I.Ability: When you [Perfect Hit] with a sword, gain +1d5 insanity.
Combat Conviction I.Condition: When you Perfect Hit with a sword, gain +1 mark.

Combat Conviction II.Ability: When you [Perfect Hit] with a sword or when you [Block]/[Deflect] a hit, gain +1d5 insanity.

Dark Eye II.Ability: +1 accuracy, +1 systemic pressure. Increase the range of your [Perfect Hit]s by 1.

Dark Impulse I.Condition: When you inflict the killing blow on a monster or murder a survivor, gain +1 mark.

Dark Impulse II.Ability: When you inflict the killing blow on a monster or murder a survivor, roll 1d10. On a 6+, gain +1 strength.
Dark Impulse II.Condition: When you are the only surivor to return from a victorious showdown, gain +1 mark.

Dark Impulse III.Ability: While adjacent to another survivor, you may spend 1 survival to murder them. When you kill another survivor, gain all their positive attributes.

Darkness I.Condition: When you suffer brain damage, gain +1 mark.

Darkness II.Ability: Add +1 to your brain trauma rolls.

Death Collector I.Ability: When a survivor dies on the showdown board, replace their minature with a Fallen Lantern terrain tile.
Death Collector I.Condition: When you activate a Fallen Lantern, gain +1 mark.

Death Collector II.Ability: When a survivor dies on the showdown board, replace their minature with a Fallen Lantern terrain tile. Gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy while you have a death token.
Death Collector II.Condition: When you activate a Fallen Lantern, gain +1 mark.

Death Collector III.Ability: When a survivor dies on the showdown board, replace their minature with a Fallen Lantern terrain tile. Gain +1 strength, +1 accuracy, & +1 evasion while you have a death token.

Death Education.Ability: When you use [Range], [Block], [Deflect], [Mindlock], or [Deadly], increase the effect by 1 for every 20 CC in the settlement.

Death Poet I.Ability: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 strength token. Limit once per showdown.
Death Poet I.Condition: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Death Poet II.Ability: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 strength token.
Death Poet II.Condition: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Death Poet III.Ability: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 strength token. If you would die from a brain trauma, all other non-deaf survivors suffer 3 brain damage instead. Limit once per showdown.

Death Sense II.Ability: You may [Dodge] 1 additional time per round.
Death Sense II.Condition: When you Dodge for the second time in a round, gain +1 mark.

Death Sense III.Ability: You may [Dodge] 1 additional time per round and you my dodge while you are attacking or [Doomed].

Death's Edge.Ability: +1 systemic pressure. Gain +1 strength for each systemic pressure you have.

Deconstructive Mind I.Ability: When you gain a disorder, you may replace one of your disorders with it.
Deconstructive Mind I.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Deconstructive Mind II.Ability: When you gain a disorder, you may gain +1 Lumi instead. Limit once per lantern year.

Demagogue I.Ability: When you [Encourage] another survivor, they gain +1 insanity.

Demagogue II.Ability: When you [Encourage] another survivor, they gain +2 insanity.

Demagogue III.Ability: +1 torment. When you [Encourage], all non-deaf survivors are affected and they gain +2 insanity.

Despair I.Condition: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Despair II.Condition: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Desperate Strike II.Ability: On a [Perfect Hit], gain +2 strength until the end of the attack.

Desperate Strike III.Ability: On a [Perfect Hit], gain +4 strength until the end of the attack.

Digestion I.Ability: You may [[Activation]] to [Consume] one of your positive attribute tokens. Archive it. Limit once per lantern year.
Digestion I.Condition: When consume an attribute token, gain +1 mark.

Digestion II.Ability: You may [[Activation]] to [Consume] one of your positive attribute tokens. Archive it and gain its effects permanently. Limit once per lantern year.

Dissociation.Ability: When you suffer a brain trauma, place your survivor in any unoccupied space within 5 spaces of your current space.

Dreamless Sleep.Ability: Ignore the effects of your disorders.
Dreamless Sleep.Condition: (Dangerous) When you depart and there is no Keeper of Dreams settlement Location, gain +1 mark.

Eight Eyes.Ability: On Arrival, if the survivors have more functioning eyes than the monster, they ambush the monster.

Envenom Edge I.Ability: When you hit a monster at least two times in one attack, it gains a venom token. When a monster has 3+ venom tokens, it suffers 1 wound. Then archive all of its venom tokens.
Envenom Edge I.Condition: When the monster suffers a wound from venom tokens, gain +1 mark.

Envenom Edge II.Ability: When you hit a monster at least two times in one attack, it gains a venom token. When a monster has 2+ venom tokens, it suffers 1 wound. Then archive all of its venom tokens.

Eudaimonia.Ability: When you make an observation, gain +1 understanding. Before making a wound roll, you may spend any amount of understanding to gain that much luck for that wound attempt.

Evasion Training I.Condition: When you are targeted, gain +1 mark.

Evasion Training II.Ability: +1 evasion, +1 torment. When you depart, subtract 2[[Armor]] from the legs.

Evermore I.Condition: Whenever you survive death, gain +1 mark.

Fear I.Condition: When you suffer damage, gain +1 mark.

Fear II.Ability: When a monster targets you, you may spend 1 survival to suffer the flee brain trauma. Limit once per showdown.

Find the Castle I.Ability: While insane, you may move up to 1 space diagonally during a [[Movement]] action.
Find the Castle I.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Find the Castle II.Ability: While insane, you may move up to 2 spaces diagonally during a [[Movement]] action.
Find the Castle II.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Find the Castle III.Ability: While insane, you may move up to 3 spaces diagonally during a [[Movement]] action.

Fingernail Door I.Ability: When you roll a lantern 10, before anything else happens, physically rotate the die to a 1 and gain +1 insanity.
Fingernail Door I.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Fingernail Door II.Ability: When you roll a lantern 10, before anything else happens, physically rotate the die to a 1 and gain +3 insanity.
Fingernail Door II.Condition: During the Aftermath, if you have 13+ insanity, gain +1 mark.

Fingernail Door III.Ability: The first time another survivor rolls a lantern 10 during the showdown, before anything else happens, physically rotate the die to a 1 and gain +1 permanent luck.

Font of Ingenuity.Ability: Whe you depart, convert all unspent endeavors into reroll tokens for yourself.

Fortis Fortuna I.Ability: On a [Perfect Hit], gain +1 Lumi. Limit once per round.
Fortis Fortuna I.Condition: When you spend Lumi, gain that many +1 marks.

Fortis Fortuna II.Condition: When you spend Lumi, gain that many +1 marks.

Fortis Fortuna III.Ability: On a [Perfect Hit], gain +1 Lumi. On Arrival, you may spend 3 Lumi to increase the range of your [Perfect Hit]s by 1 this lantern year.

Fortune & Misfortune I.Ability: On Arrival, gain +1 luck token and all other survivors gain +1 systemic pressure token.
Fortune & Misfortune I.Condition: When you critically wound, gain +1 mark.

Fortune & Misfortune II.Ability: On Arrival, gain +2 luck tokens and all other survivors gain +2 systemic pressure tokens.
Fortune & Misfortune II.Condition: When a survivor with systemic pressure tokens dies from a severe injury, gain +1 mark.

Fortune & Misfortune III.Ability: On Arrival, gain +3 luck tokens and all other survivors gain +3 systemic pressure tokens.

Freedom.Ability: Once per round, you may spend 1 Lumi to perform a survival action, including repeating survival actions you have already performed.

Gambler's Grace.Ability: +2 systemic pressure, +1 luck. When you roll a 1 during the hunt or showdown phase, lose 1 survival and reroll it.

Gastromancer.Ability: When you depart, gain the Second Stomach survivor status card.

Ghostzerker.Ability: [Subconscious]. Treat all your tokens, including ones on survivor status cards, as death tokens.

Guardian I.Ability: After an adjacent survivor makes a roll, you may intervene. Gain +1 systemic pressure token and reroll one of their roll results. Limit once per showdown.
Guardian I.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Guardian II.Ability: After an a survivor in your field of view makes a roll, you may intervene. Gain +1 systemic pressure token and reroll one of their roll results. Limit once per showdown.
Guardian II.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Guardian III.Ability: After an a survivor in your field of view makes a roll, you may intervene. Gain +1 systemic pressure token and reroll one of their roll results. Limit twice per showdown.

Hardy Ego.Ability: When you would suffer a brain trauma, instead draw two knowledges. Replace this with one of them.

Health I.Ability: When you [Consume] during the hunt or showdown, gain +1 strength token.
Health I.Condition: When you consume during the hunt or showdown, gain +1 mark.

Health II.Ability: When you [Consume] during the hunt or showdown, gain +1 strength or accuracy token.
Health II.Condition: When you consume during the hunt or showdown, gain +1 mark.

Health III.Ability: When you [Consume] during the hunt or showdown, gain +1 strength, speed, or accuracy token.

Herb Grinder I.Condition: When you gain Fresh Acanthus, gain +1 mark.

Herb Grinder II.Ability: [[Movement]][[Activation]]: Archive a Fresh Acanthus to grind it into a medicial paste. You or an adjacent survivor fully heal 2 hit locations.
Herb Grinder II.Condition: When you grind Fresh Acanthus into a medicinal paste, gain +1 mark.

Herb Grinder III.Ability: [[Movement]][[Activation]]: Archive a Fresh Acanthus to grind it into a medicial paste. You or an adjacent survivor fully heal all hit locations.

High Roller I.Ability: +1 torment. You may steal a d10 from an attack roll made against you. If you do, the speed of the attack is reduced by 1. Place the stolen d10 aside with the roll result unchanged. You cannot steal a d10 while you have one stolen. After your wound attempt roll, you may replace a single roll result with the stolen d10 result.
High Roller I.Condition: When replacing a d10 with a stolen d10, gain +1 mark.

High Roller II.Ability: +1 torment. You may steal a d10 from an attack roll made against you. If you do, the speed of the attack is reduced by 1. Place the stolen d10 aside with the roll result unchanged. You cannot steal a d10 while you have one stolen. During your attack, you may replace a single roll result with the stolen d10 result.

Hissing Arms I.Ability: All of your weapons gain [Paired]. You cannot pair two-handed weapons this way. While you have paired weapons in your gear grid, you may spend [[Activation]] to [Deflect] 1.
Hissing Arms I.Condition: When you make a paired attack, gain +1 mark.

Hissing Arms II.Ability: All of your weapons gain [Paired]. You cannot pair two-handed weapons this way. While you have paired weapons in your gear grid, you may spend [[Activation]] to [Deflect] 2.
Hissing Arms II.Condition: When you make a paired attack, gain +1 mark.

Hissing Arms III.Ability: All of your weapons gain [Paired]. You cannot pair two-handed weapons this way. While you have paired weapons in your gear grid, you may spend [[Activation]] to [Deflect] 3.

Imagination.Ability: You may spend 3 Lumi to gain a rank of weapon proficiency. Limit once per lantern year.
Imagination.Condition: When you depart with 12 or more Lumi, gain +1 mark.

Juggernaut I.Ability: When you suffer a severe injury, you may archive 2 positive attribute tokens to ignore it.
Juggernaut I.Condition: When you use this knowledge, gain +1 mark.

Juggernaut II.Ability: When you suffer a severe injury, you may archive 1 positive attribute token to ignore it.

Lanterns' Souls.Ability: When you depart, +1 affinity of your choice.

Legion I.Condition: When another survivor in the settlement has Legion, gain +1 mark.

Legion II.Ability: You may spend 3 Lumi to teach another survivor Legion. Limit once per lantern year.
Legion II.Condition: When there are 8 survivors in the settlement with Legion, gain +1 mark.

Legion III.Ability: You gain strength equal to the number of survivors with Legion on the showdown board.

Life Eater.Ability: [Subconscious]. On Arrival, gain a death token. [[Activation]]: [Consume] a Death token. Archive it and suffer the [Frenzy] brain trauma.

Light Stealer.Ability: After you successfully wound the monster, you end your attack and attempt to steal the monster's soul. Roll 1d10. On a 3+, gain a Death token. Limit [[Star]] times per showdown.

Light Warrior.Ability: On Arrival, gain a Death token. [[Activation]]: Gain +2 strength for each death token you have until the end of your next attack. Then roll 1d10. On a 1, [Consume] a Death token. Archive it and suffer the [Frenzy] brain truama.

Light Whisperer.Ability: On Arrival, gain a Death token. [[Activation]]: Reveal cards from the top of the HL deck equal to the number of your Death tokens and put them back in any order. Then roll 1d10. On a 1, [Consume] a Death token. Archive it and suffer the [Frenzy] brain truama.

Limit Break.Ability: At the start of the showdown, you may gain +1 movement, accuracy, evasion, strength, and luck. You will die during the Aftermath. In the Aftermath, nominate another survivor. They gain this knowledge.

Meat Shield.Ability: Before resolving damage from a monster's Move & Attack action, you may exchange places with a survivor adjacent to you. They suffer any damage instead. A switched survivor cannot perform Meat Shield or [Dodge].

Mirror Eyes I.Condition: When you hit the monster at least 2 times in one attack, gain +1 mark.

Mirror Eyes II.Ability: When you make a paired attack, it gains [Precision] 1.
Mirror Eyes II.Condition: When you hit the monster at least 3 times in one attack, gain +1 mark.

Mirror Eyes III.Ability: When you make a paired attack, it gains [Precision] 2.

Myrmidon's Call.Ability: You [Encourage] without spending survival. When you Encourage a survivor, they gain +2 movement tokens until the end of the round.

Osteophage I.Ability: You may archive a bone resource to [Consume] it. If you do, gain the [Marrow Hunger] impairment.
Osteophage I.Condition: When you consume a bone, gain +1 mark.

Osteophage II.Ability: You may archive a bone resource to [Consume] it. If you do, gain the [Marrow Hunger] impairment. When you depart with no armor and no shield in your gear grid, add 1[[Armor]] to all hit locations for each observation of this knowledge.
Osteophage II.Condition: When you consume a bone, gain +1 mark.

Osteophage III.Ability: You may archive a bone resource to [Consume] it. If you do, [Heal] your survivor. Limit once per lantern year. When you depart with no armor an dnow shield in your gear grid, add 6[[Armor]] to all hit locations.

Perfect Physique.Ability: At the beginning of your act, you may gain +3 strength and -3 movement until the end of the round.

Physiognomy I.Ability: During the showdown setup, draw an additional terrain card and place it according to its setup rules.
Physiognomy I.Condition: When you activate terrain, gain +1 mark.

Physiognomy II.Ability: During the showdown setup, draw two additional terrain cards and pick one. Place it according to its setup rules.

Plausibility I.Condition: When you suffer a severe injury, gain +1 mark.

Plausibility II.Ability: When you suffer a severe injury, gain a reroll token.
Plausibility II.Condition: when you use a reroll token on a severe injury roll, gain +1 mark.

Plausibility III.Ability: When you suffer a severe injury, but before you roll, gain a reroll token.

Positivity I.Ability: On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain 1 reroll token.
Positivity I.Condition: In the Aftermath, if your survial is at the settlement's survival limit, gain +1 mark.

Positivity II.Ability: On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain 2 reroll tokens.
Positivity II.Condition: In the Aftermath, gain +1 mark for each reroll token you have.

Positivity III.Ability: On Arrival, if your survival is at the settlement's survival limit, gain 2 reroll tokens. When you reroll result is 9+, gain another reroll token.

Potentia Est I.Ability: Increase the total number of knowledges you can have by 1, to a limit of 4.
Potentia Est I.Condition: When you depart with 4 knowledges, gain +1 mark.

Potentia Est II.Ability: +1 torment. Increase the total number of knowledges you can have by 2, to a limit of 5.

Pyschopathy I.Ability: Reduce all brain damage suffered during the showdown by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
Pyschopathy I.Condition: When you suffer brain damage during the showdown, gain +1 mark.

Pyschopathy II.Ability: Reduce all brain damage suffered during the showdown by 2 (to a minimum of 1).
Pyschopathy II.Condition: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain +1 mark.

Queen of Hands.Ability: +2 speed, +1 systemic pressure. When the left and right columns of your gear grid match, you may cancel any number of hits in you attack before drawing HL. For each cancelled hit, +1 luck for the rest of the attack.

Razor's Edge.Ability: While you have no armor points, you attacks with melee weapons gain [Devastating] 1.
Razor's Edge.Condition: (Dangerous) When you wound the monster, gain +1 mark.

Relativity.Ability: +1 torment, +1 systemic pressure. In the Aftermath, each survivor must gain +1 mark in a knowledge of their choice.

Relentless I.Condition: When a monster moves away from you during your attack, gain +1 mark.

Relentless II.Ability: When a monster moves away from you during your attack, you must [Pursue]. Limit once per attack.
Relentless II.Condition: When you pursue and wound, gain +1 mark.

Relentless III.Ability: When a monster moves away from you during your attack, you may [Pursue]. Limit once per attack.

Rolling Dive.Ability: +1 torment. When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend [[Movement]] to place your survivor on any other unoccupied space adjacent to the monster.

Sculptor's Apprentice.Ability: During the hunt or showdown, add 9[[Armor]] to all hit locations. During the Aftermath, you are never seen again.

Serial Code I.Condition: When you depart after the settlement has witnessed The Game, gain +1 mark.

Serial Code II.Ability: If you would die, you inexplicably survive. Suffer -1 permanent luck and lose this knowledge. Limit once per lifetime.

Shatterstar I.Ability: When you attack with a [Frail] weapon, gain +1 strength until the end of the attack.
Shatterstar I.Condition: When you attack with a Frail weapon, gain +1 mark.

Shatterstar II.Ability: When you attack with a [Frail] weapon, gain +2 strength until the end of the attack.
Shatterstar II.Condition: When you archive a Frail weapon, gain +1 mark.

Shatterstar III.Ability: When you would archive a [Frail] weapon without a Cracked token, put a Cracked token on it instead. When you attack with a [Frail] weapon, gain +2 strength until the end of the attack. If it has a Cracked token, gain +5 strength instead.

Stone Architect.Ability: +1 torment. When you are a returning survivor, add +1 construction point to the dream project.

Stone Heart I.Condition: When you suffer a severe injury, gain +1 mark.

Stone Heart II.Ability: Add +1 to your severe injury results.
Stone Heart II.Condition: When you suffer a severe injury, gain +1 mark.

Stone Heart III.Ability: Add +2 to your severe injury results.

Stone Skin I.Ability: When a hit causes you to fill in a heavy injury level, cancel any remaining damage from that hit.
Stone Skin I.Condition: When you fill in a heavy injury level, gain +1 mark.

Stone Skin II.Ability: When a hit causes you to fill in a light or heavy injury level, cancel any remaining damage from that hit.
Stone Skin II.Condition: When you are a Rank 4 Marrowist, gain +1 mark.

Stone Skin III.Ability: Gain an additional light injury box at every hit location. When a hit causes you to fill in a light or heavy injury level, cancel any remaining damage from that hit.

Stone Wrecker.Ability: Once per showdown, if adjacent to a Stone Column, you may spend [[Activation]] to lift it as a weapon! Archive the terrain tile and gain the Stone Column rare gear. If you still have it during the Aftermath, archive it.

Story of the Four Hands.Ability: Melee weapons gain [Deadly] 9 and ignore teh monster's luck when you attack with them.
Story of the Four Hands.Condition: (Dangerous) When you are critically wound, gain +1 mark.

Story of the Gloaming.Ability: The first time you ignore a hit from a drawn AI using [Block] or [Deflect], the monster suffers a wound.

Story of the Hunter's Arrow.Ability: When you hit with a ranged weapon, you must reveal the entire HL deck and select a hit location to attempt to wound. Then shuffle the deck.
Story of the Hunter's Arrow.Condition: (Dangerous) Whe you hit with a ranged weapon, gain +1 mark.

Story of the Rootcrown.Ability: When another survivor [Encourage]s you, they die. Survivors adjacent to them suffer [[Star]] severe injuries. Monsters adjacent to them suffer [[Star]] automatic wounds.

Strength Training I.Condition: When you wound the monster, gain +1 mark. Limit once per attack.

Surgical Precision.Ability: If all the gear in your gear grid has the bone keyword, your weapons lose [Frail] and gain [Sharp].

Sword & Shield Style.Ability: When you have sword specialization, you also have shield specialization and visa versa.

Tactical Drag I.Condition: When you spend [[Movement]] to escape a zone, gain +1 mark.

Tactical Drag II.Ability: Spend [[Movement]] to drag an adjacent survivor, full move away from the monster, and place the survivor adjacent to you, knocked down. Then you are knocked down.
Tactical Drag II.Condition: When another survivor would be attacked or suffer damage from a zone and your drag avoids that outcome, gain +1 mark.

Tactical Drag III.Ability: Spend [[Movement]] to drag an adjacent survivor, full move away from the monster, and place the survivor adjacent to you, knocked down.

Team Sacrifice.Ability: Instead of rolling to pick a Straggler during the hunt, you can choose to be the straggler. When you are the Straggler, add +3 to your roll results.

Tenacity I.Ability: When you depart, gain a survival token. You may spend a survival token at any time to gain +1 survival.
Tenacity I.Condition: When you spend a survival token, gain +1 mark.

Tenacity II.Ability: When you depart, gain 2 survival tokens. You may spend a survival token at any time to gain +1 survival.
Tenacity II.Condition: When you spend a survival token, gain +1 mark.

Tenacity III.Ability: When you depart, gain 3 survival tokens. You may spend a survival token at any time to gain +1 survival.

The Breaking Point.Ability: +1 luck to wound attempts on hit locations with a persistent injury.

Tumble I.Ability: When something would [Collide] with you, roll 1d10. On a 7+, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.
Tumble I.Condition: When you successfully Tumble, gain +1 mark.

Tumble II.Ability: When something would [Collide] with you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.
Tumble II.Condition: When you successfully Tumble, gain +1 mark.

Tumble III.Ability: When something would [Collide] with you, roll 1d10. On a 5+, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.

Unyielding I.Condition: When you are targeted by an AI card, gain +1 mark.

Unyielding II.Ability: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Void.Ability: +2 torment. [[Movement]][[Activation]]: For the rest of the showdown, you are unaffected by Intimidate actions and you cannot gain knowledge, observations, disorders, survival, or insanity.

Wanderlust.Ability: When you gain Hunt XP during the hunt or showdown, gain that much Lumi (this includes the Aftermath).
Wanderlust.Condition: When you depart with 6+ Lumi, gain +1 mark.
